message.body: Why you never play me back anymore ):
Took me a while, but I played! Sorry I forever have low battery hah
Hah okay well I'm not getting it then. You went out tonight?
Oh, well you shud get it soon. And yep, you?
Op just did. What're you doin now? And for a bit, but meh
Word, well lastnight fun? And with John, he stayed in tonight
Well yeah for a bit. Ah skyrim? How was your night? I feel like meh Hah
Why do you feel like that? And yup, but I'm so tired, gonna sleep soon
Nice, let you go? And I don't know. Sad, haven't talked to you in forever. Never get what I want, I'm a total fuck up, and have no one to talk to hah
Don't say that Sara, you're not that okay. And we are talking tmrw. I felt meh yesterday. It's just we gotta get used to this, it's hard
Yeah but I am, idk I wish I just had a you to talk to. Or a someone. And we will, maybe. Idk if we will. Shud I let you sleep?
You dk if we will what? And not even home yet, you're all good
If well get used to it. Idk how to. Half of me is but the other half...idk. I'm just this screw up and can't fix myself or put my life together ha
Sara, that's not true. Why wud you say that? And eventually we will get used to it. I know it.
Idk I just always mess everything up and blah. Ojay, I just miss you so much, like just talking to yiu. Crap
We can talk tmrw. I was prty down yesterday, things will get smoother and better in time on
Ok
I know we can. Why were you down? When I asked yiu said yiu were fine
Well I was up late and got sad before going to bed and such for a while. But imma goto sleep soon
Why sad? And alright, I'll TTY tnrw I guess
Idk just cuz it's weird getting used to nodes contact and such ya know? And cool, Skype tmrw night?
Well you never try and contact me Johnny, I always talk to you first. You can do that you know. And sure thing
Well we agreed to talking on Sunday after he weekend remember? So that's why I didn't and such, plus it's better to get used to ya kno
Yes of course, but you can still talk to me whenever Johnny. Oh crap, sobbing at greys, wassup
Hah don't do it! But I'll ttyt, and okay I'll keep that in mind. Night Sara! Ciaociao
Night Johnny, sleep well, hit me up tmrw! Ciao
￼Wtf mate
Damn! Populars!
Every single thing on this guys tumblr right now is from me. Literally everything
Really? Why is that? And you can't change it back?:/
Weird, meh I've lost so much traffic since the URL change...
No it won't let me! Sho weak! And well ever since then I've had very little, might be something else. Idk
Hmm well honestly you've barely been posting anything for like 2 weeks, it might be that. Like I go to check yours out and you have like four new pics
Yeah. I havnt been having very many runs lately, since midterms are over imma get gnarly again!
Well you also don't Skype me and go on tumblr :P midterms were okay tho? I gots one Monday
Yeah midterms were chill overall. And yeah this is true. For what class?
Linguistics, gotta study. But going to lunch now. When did you wanna talk today?
Heh I'm going to breakfast now. And like tonight? Hmph your call
If its tonight it might have to be a little later than usual but idk, I can keep you posted? And well going to brunch so there (:
Hah for sure. Ciao for now, we will figure
Mmk let me know when you're free
I'll check the tracking number inna bit!
Do you know when my package will get here? Gotta prepare myself haha (:
Okay no worries. But I should be able to talk tonight around 10 or 11 if you're down with that
Okay, that works for me, tell me when it's good
For shua! Sounds like a plan man
Alrighty, I'll just text you when I head home and such
Fo shua barrada:P hehe
Hah you and your Hawaiian slang huh
I learn from the best
Massively stressed out. You?
How's you?
Alright, got some hw to do. Why so stressed?
Midterm tomorrow, two Short papers, one intro, and 100 pages of reading. And just really stressed in general about life
Mmm damn, well what's the most pressing and do that first. And anyway in which I can help?
Yeah just making a study guide now. And no not really. I just, need to focus or something. Life is just really complicated right now haha
I wish I cud help. And good call, I'm sure your midterm will be chill. And things will get better
Yeah idk it's just hard to get back into it. Want this to be over. Wanna be home and it to be summer and I just want so many things hah.
For sure, and it'll come faster than you think. And I feel yah, hang in there Sara. Idk what to say :/

Yeah this month has gone by really fast. Ahh spring break where are yiu?? And nothing to say, Johnny. You are such a good person, really. You are one of those rare truly good people. I'm grateful I met you.
You are too Sara, you're an amazing person and I'm happy I met you also. And for real! I want break to come so badly

Hah me too! I'll see you at least once yeah? For coffee or something? Oh ps how come sometimes on tumblr it goes away when there's like a person who reblogge 20 of your photos? Like someone else jut followed me and reblogged 20 photos and the last one dis
Yeah, but ppl are like...looking at my blog omg. And sweet (: hah is it bad I'm excited?
I have no idea? Tumblr is weird sometimes with that, like some reblogs will show up and others won't. And yeah I'm down with coffee
Hah that's awesome! Go new scars! And no that's fine, Itll be good ya kno
Yeah it definitely will, and I posted something on your wall, idk if that's weird or not tho....
Say something on it so I feel less weird abit it (:
Sweet photo! And no that's not weird. Pretty sick one tho for sure
Nice nice, and word up peace dewd. Ciaociao
Yeah don't leave it hangin hah! And yeah I see it all the time! But I should study now. And I found a Clark Kerr smoking buddy yee (:
Skype in twenty?
I'm jumping in the shower, can I Skype you after that? Will prlly take twenty hah
Okay coolio. See you then! Ciaociao
Skype me qheneverp
Okay, I will in five
Are we playing words still? Ps do your fafsa if you haven't. Pps. For some reason I feel like we're breaking up all over again.
Yes we are still playing, deciding not to do it. And I'm sorry. But gonna ttyl on Sunday. Ciao Sara
Oh okay, well thought I'd remind you just in case. Bye Johnny.
Thanks, bai!

You know what? We're not talking and I get it, but I can't be friends with you until I say this, so I'm sorry. I know how I fucked up with you, how I always fuck up with everyone, but no one ever gives me credit for the things I do right. And I did so man

I know i didn't do everything right Sara, and I understand that and own up to it. Yes of course you did things right, we had the time of our lives. And yes I understand to forgive people and will continue too. I think i did with you to a certain extent. I

I'm not saying this to be mean, or to hurt you. But you say you forgive things, but you don't forget them. It takes you so long, and I was similar. But I learned from you. And I don't deserve another chance with you, I really don't. But I don't know how t
Well I think time right now is good to have. We can talk again on Sunday about this okay. I won't leave early and you can get everything you want out. Just don't make it into something else okay.
Don't make it into what? What do I make it into? And I thought the point of this time was to learn to be friends?
Yes of course, we def need to learn to be friends and I think some time away will help us think and such. Just a week. And like last time when it turned into a fight ya know...

I'm not saying this to get you to talk to me, last night was just bad. I unloaded on you, I fought with you, it wasn't fair. I was mad because life is unfair, and it's just harsh. It's really just harsh when the person you love can't love you back the way
I don't think it will at all, will def take lotsa work. Taking this slow, which I feel is better than fast. I'll tty Sunday Sara, ciao.
Byee thanks for the sentiment

One more thing and then I really won't talk to you until Sunday: I need to know you'll actually talk to me, no holds barred(or whatever the phrase is), give me more than a measly hour. I used to mean something to you. I need to know you won't run away fro
Yes Sara, I'll tty for a long time with no limit. And dk the phrase but I get it what you mean.
Thank you Johnny. Have a good one, take the time you need. Just think and be happy, I want you to be happy. See you Sunday
Night Johnny. And I do mean it. If you're gonna believe anything believe that I want you to be happy. See you then
